answers.answer: Hello,this could be a urinary tract infection.  Please take him to the doctor and get his urine tested.Urinary tract infections are more common in people with diabetes.Please get this looked at asap and let us know how he goes.

question: my 4yr old grandson is a dietabetic and has low keytones and is having pain when peeing.Could this be from a kidney stone? the doctors have his blood surgar and keytones down,except he screams in pain when peeing. PLEASE HELP
title: grandpa wants to know
